title: #492 The Jews with Joe List, Jim Norton, Robert Kelly, Ryan Long and Joe DeRosa
itunes:title: The Jews with Joe List, Jim Norton, Robert Kelly, Ryan Long and Joe DeRosa
description:
Live from Skankfest Vegas Ryan Long, Jim Norton, Joe List, Robert Kelly, and Joe DeRosa join me as we berate the crowd for telling awful stories about Jews.

ARI SHAFFIR: JEW OUT NOV. 2ND--TOMORROW

For more Ari:

Get tickets to see Ari on the road: https://www.arishaffir.com/tour

Cool merch & more: https://www.arishaffir.com/

 

Joe List

For more Joe List: 

Instagram: @joelistcomedy

Ryan Long: 

Instagram - @ryanlongcomedy 

Ryan Long - YouTube

Ryan Long: White Immigrant - Full Special 



For more Joe DeRosa:

https://www.instagram.com/joederosacomedy/ 

https://linktr.ee/joederosacomedy 

 

For more Jim Norton:

https://www.instagram.com/jimnorton/ 

https://linktr.ee/JimNorton 

 

For more Robert Kelly:

Watch Bobby’s new special Kill Box available now: 

For more: https://robertkellylive.com/ 

 

https://bit.ly/bk-kb 

 

The Music:

Lil Dicky- Jewish Flow

Kanye West- Black Skinhead

Me First and the Gimmie Gimmies- Hava Nagila

Leonard Cohen- Halleluja

 

Thanks to our sponsors! BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month and 3Chi.com and use code "Ari" for 5% off your order!
